description:
My loft apartment is available for visitors to NYC (business or pleasure). It is a light filled open space with 12 foot/3.60m high ceilings. My place is close to Fort Greene Park, Pratt Institute, and all the lovely cafes and restaurants of Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, Bedford-Stuyvesant. Whether you are a couple traveling overseas, solo adventurers, in new york on business, or a family (with kids), you will be happy in my place!

A gorgeous and amazing open space just like what you should experience in a Brooklyn old factory apartment converted.

The apartment is a 5 minute walking distance to subway and extremely convenient with restaurantes and grocery stores.
name: gorgeous loft!
